1.0.2.name: wordpress/bookitme-booking-calendar
1.0.2.description:
The Bookitme lets you add online time sheet booking or appointments and reservation handling to your website It is simple way to display booking calendar in post or page. Simply adding a shortcode [bookitme-calendar] [bookitme-timeline] and to a page. See the Plugin screenshots for examples.

This gives your visitors an efficient way to view ALL booking calendar from bookitme.com site on ONE place. Shortodes: [bookitme-calendar] – display calendar on page or post params: [bookitme-calendar width="1024" height="420" url="http://www.bookitme.com/tms-demo/tms.html"]

[bookitme-timeline] params: [bookitme-timeline width="1024" height="300" url="http://www.bookitme.com/tms-time/index.php"]

Admin Page: all shortcode input parameters are setup in admin page. If you not specified input parameters in shortcode definition default values from Admin panel will be used.
